Package helpers

Class Helpers

java.lang.Object
helpers.Helpers
public class Helpers extends Object
The Helpers class provides various helper methods for parsing CSV records, handling errors, writing errors to files, performing cleanup operations, and displaying welcome messages.

  • Method Details

    • parseCSVRecord

      public static String parseCSVRecord(String p_record)
      Parses a CSV record by replacing commas with pipes ('|') and appending a dummy value for the year field if necessary.
      Parameters:
      p_record - The CSV record to parse.
      Returns:
      The parsed record.

    • addErrorToBuffer

      public static void addErrorToBuffer(String p_error, String p_record)
      Adds an error message along with the corresponding record to the error buffer.
      Parameters:
      p_error - The error message.
      p_record - The record associated with the error.

    • writeErrorsToFile

      public static void writeErrorsToFile(String p_errorFilename, String p_outputFilename)
      Writes errors from the error buffer to a file.
      Parameters:
      p_errorFilename - The filename in which error occurs.
      p_outputFilename - The filename of the output file.
